name: ABYSSN'T
description:
Try to escape the infinite depths of a black hole by pushing away as much space junk as possible!

CONTROLS:

  • A - Thrust Left
  • D - Thrust Right
  • Space - Jump/Interact
  • Menus navigation with mouse!!!

Made by Redoak Studios for Ludum Dare 48

Diotins - Lead Programmer
Kyx - 3D Artist
NCHammer - VFX Artist
Rui Martins - Programmer, Sound Designer
